content.text: Hey, I'm looking for a place to live that's close to school and has a quiet environment.
I live in a small home and love my collection of comic books.
Oh cool. I like comics too. Do you have a favorite series?
I like reading about superheroes, so I like Marvel and DC comics.
Me too! I've been following the new Spider-Man series.
I love Spider-Man! He's one of my favorite superheroes.
I'm also a fan of Batman. He's such a complex character.
He is. I like how he's not perfect, but he still tries to do the right thing.
Me too. He's a great role model.
Do you have any other favorite superheroes?
Yeah, I like Superman too. He's the original superhero.
He is. He's a classic.
I also like Thor and the Hulk.
Me too! I like how Thor is a god and the Hulk is a monster. They're both so different, but they're both heroes.
I agree. They're both great characters.
I'm glad we agree.
Me too.
I'm going to go skate now. Do you want to come with me?
I can't. I have to go to school.
Okay. Have fun.
You too.
